message.body: Hey!!! HB said hunter probably didn't need to make greens cause there is enough food already so we got some wine!
And a pumpkin pie!
You guys bring and do whatever you would like. It's always nice having new things added to the table. But I also know hb needs extra hands and she said hunter didn't feel well.
But let us know if we can pick anything else up beer, anythingn
We aren't picky. Just excited to have everyone together.
Me too! Hunters been sick and napping so he might give up on his grand plans. Ha. Okay well call us if you need anything! Can't wait!!!
Haha that's fine. I understand. I've had two sick kids. I disinfected everything today. Don't stress over it. Just do me a favor and help hb as best as you can.
Please
Yeah we are packing up the dishes tonight and making the oysters in the morning. Hunter is hanging a painting on Friday. I think she was happy your mom came over to help
We only need two now. :-). Don't let her pack any extras. We just set the table.
Yeah I think so too. It was good for her. And my mom.
Yes.
Only two plates?
Okay I'll make sure.
Thank you
No problem! Can't wait to see you guys. <3
Omg is it bad I'm pintrest ING how to set a table. Haha
Hahaha. I love it! I think I've done the same thing!
I don't want to hear hb say it's wrong. And then I got Cesar's saying who cares it's on the table. Haha.
How's hb and hunter feeling
Hunter is in bed and HB and I are being chatty! Why are you awake! Haha

Haha! I just sat down. Tell hb...playroom cleaned, bathrooms (yes all) cleaned, floors cleaned, table set, kicthen cleaned, potatoes peeled, turkeys are in the brine. Yep I'm tired! Haha. Eating Oreos and drinking milk.
All that's left is to vacuum.
Haha I'll go soon. It feels good to sit down. I won't lie I did take a hour break earlier, and I did an orange box for dinner. Haha.
OMG.
You are amazing.
She says you deserve a good night sleep!
I think you deserved an hour break jeesh!!
Haha. I did have a cup of coffee to recharge. Good thing we are done for tonight. Cesar's dying on me.
I lost Hunter an hour ago! I'm glad you guys get some down time tonight. I'm ready to hit the hay myself.
Yeah we are headed up in a few. Have a great night. Enjoy hb! Love ya.
I will its been sooo nice catching up. Have a good night.

Good morning cuz!!! Update: Cesar and I are on our way to see grandpa. Mom and dad have the kids and their list of timelines. Haha mom is trying to figure out what to do and how to get the corn pudding done. Anyways I told her I was pretty sure you guys would cook the oysters at hb and bring it up. We will be back at 12 to get the turkey on the fryer. It will take 60 minutes for it to cook. Leah, and dad and Iliana will be at the house around 1130! Mom put her cell phone on so if you guys need her call her and call when you get there. I think that's it. I hope hunter is feeling better. Andrew has a nasty barking cough. So exciting. Good thing i disinfected yesterday and I think I'll do it again tomorrow. HHaha. Love you!

It's gonna be a sick factory. The oysters take 1 hour and a half from what HB said. We are doing good over here though! Pretty much all ready to go Cept for oysters! Give Cesar's family my love. I'm thinking about them.
Hahaha. Sounds good. I just wanted you to know if you need to stay there to cook it to give hb some more resting time then please do. I know she's not feeling well.
Yeah she's is stress in but everything is actually really good! I'm just trying to keep her butt in that chair!
Yes please do! How do you like her family room?
She shouldn't stress. It's all going to work out! And it's my job to stress now. Next year I'll do the stuffing. I should of done it this year.
Oh I'll do it next year. In 5 years I'll do it all. Everyone can come and eat. Mia will be in school. Haha I'll have time.
What!! You are doing enough!! It's all good. I love the family room! So much space!
Haha. Sounds good.
Okay I gotta get these oyster in the oven stat! We will see you very soon
